snippet: Pressure to adopt a cholera vaccine as part of the routine response to outbreaks mounted as two expert panels advised the World Health Organization to use it.
abstract: Pressure to adopt a cholera vaccine as part of the routine response to outbreaks mounts as two expert panels advise the World Health Organization to adopt the practice; vaccine is for healthy people, but it could be used to surround outbreaks and keep them from spreading.
lead_paragraph: Pressure to adopt a cholera vaccine as part of the routine response to outbreaks mounted as two expert panels advised the World Health Organization to use it.
